content.query:
DROP TABLE TrafficViolation;
CREATE TABLE TrafficViolation (
    LogId varchar(50),
    ViolationPatternId varchar(255),
    StatusId varchar(255),
    DocumentNumber varchar(255),
    OperationTeam varchar(100),
    Dear varchar(100),
    VehicleOwner varchar(100), 
    DOB datetime,
    Address varchar(255),
    LocationViolation varchar(255),
    Description varchar(1000),
    Coordinate varchar(255),
    SettlementAgency varchar(100),
    DateTranfer date,
    DateSolving date,
    ExtraData varchar(4000),
    ID varchar(50),
    CreatedAt date,
    UpdatedAt date, 
    DeletedAt date
)
DROP TABLE TrafficLog;
CREATE TABLE TrafficLog (
    Time date, 
    PlateNo varchar(50),
    PlateColor varchar(255),
    VehicleType varchar(255),
    VehicleColor varchar(255),
    VehicleModel varchar(255),
    Speed int,
    Lane int,
    IsWrongLane bit,
    IsOverload bit, 
    WeightOverload int,
    IsOversize bit,
    VolumeOversize varchar(100),
    VehicleLength int,
    VehicleWidth int, 
    VehicleHeight int,
    EventTraffic varchar(255),
    Hash varchar(255),
    ExtraData NVARCHAR(4000),
    ID varchar(50),
    CreatedAt date,
    UpdatedAt date, 
    DeletedAt date,
    AfterImg varchar(500),
    BeforeImg varchar(500), 
    BigImg varchar(500),
    SmallImg varchar(500)
)
CREATE INDEX idx_id ON TrafficLog (ID);
CREATE INDEX idx_time ON TrafficLog (Time);
CREATE INDEX idx_PlateNo ON TrafficLog (PlateNo);
CREATE INDEX idx_Speed ON TrafficLog (Speed);
CREATE INDEX idx_VehicleType ON TrafficLog (VehicleType);
CREATE INDEX idx_Lane ON TrafficLog (Lane);
CREATE INDEX idx_CreatedAt ON TrafficLog (CreatedAt);
CREATE INDEX idx_DeletedAt ON TrafficLog (DeletedAt);
-- kt hp index CreatedAt and VehicleType and PlateNo and DeletedAt
CREATE INDEX idx_CreatedAt_VehicleType_PlateNo_DeletedAt ON TrafficLog (CreatedAt,VehicleType,PlateNo,DeletedAt);
-- kt hp index CreatedAt and speed and DeletedAt
CREATE INDEX idx_CreatedAt_Speed_DeletedAt ON TrafficLog (CreatedAt,Speed,DeletedAt);
TRUNCATE TABLE TrafficLog;

CREATE TABLE ReportOverview (
    TotalAllVehicleByDay BIGINT,
    TotalViolationVehicleByDay BIGINT,
    TotalMissDataImageByDay BIGINT,
    TotalMissDataSpeedByDay BIGINT,
    ID varchar(50),
    CreatedAt DATETIME
);

-- Create table based on schemaReportVehicleFluctuations
CREATE TABLE ReportVehicleFluctuations (
    Type NVARCHAR(255),
    ZeroHour BIGINT,
    OneHour BIGINT,
    TwoHour BIGINT,
    ThreeHour BIGINT,
    FourHour BIGINT,
    FiveHour BIGINT,
    SixHour BIGINT,
    SevenHour BIGINT,
    EightHour BIGINT,
    NineHour BIGINT,
    TenHour BIGINT,
    ElevenHour BIGINT,
    TwelveHour BIGINT,
    ThirteenHour BIGINT,
    FourteenHour BIGINT,
    FifteenHour BIGINT,
    SixteenHour BIGINT,
    SeventeenHour BIGINT,
    EighteenHour BIGINT,
    NineteenHour BIGINT,
    TwentyHour BIGINT,
    TwentyOneHour BIGINT,
    TwentyTwoHour BIGINT,
    TwentyThreeHour BIGINT,
    ID varchar(50),
    CreatedAt date
);

-- Create table based on schemaReportClassifyVehicle
CREATE TABLE ReportClassifyVehicle (
    Type NVARCHAR(255),
    Name NVARCHAR(255),
    Total BIGINT,
    ID varchar(50),
    CreatedAt date
);
